https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eTGHgUvUjC8UQmizSZ5W8YBjzh0.jpg Centaur lives a modest life with his family in rural Kyrgyzstan until he abruptly becomes the center of attention when he is caught stealing a racehorse at night.
